title: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Purview | Activity explorer user experience improvements (US Government clouds)
description:
We're improving the user experience of the Activity explorer in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. New functionality includes a refresh button to allow refreshing the data without reloading the page, and a new option for "Sensitive info type" added to the list of customizable columns.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/data-classification-activity-explorer?view=o365-worldwide
